title: Why does Yasuo's wind wall still completely destroy Talon ult after 1 year?
body:
talon's ult should be intercepted at where it hits the wall, but not the ENTIRE thing should be destroyed upon contact

like when MF ults into a windwall slightly to the left, the projectiles that hit it are killed, but the ones that the wall isn't at aren't killed 

Either you can't code it, which means the client is shit

or you actually intended this as balance, which means you are full of shit Riot.
